name: A Safer Place
description:
Its a short little story based horror game Where you are Mark, who is a writer searching for inspiration for his new book. 

It has 2D and 3D Gameplay.

CONRTROLS:

WASD to move in both dimensions

SPACE to move to the next dialog

I am so sorry ,it doesnt have browser version. I really tried(Some technical issue)I will update the page as soon as i solve that issue. (Thank you)

Made using Godot
